args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{"result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: High Voltage Battery May Short Circuit

Bollinger Motors, Inc. (Bollinger Motors) is recalling certain 2025 B4 trucks.  The high voltage battery pack may be improperly sealed and allow liquid to enter the battery.Liquid intrusion into a battery pack can cause a loss of electrical isolation or short circuit, increasing the risk of a fire or shock hazard.  In addition, the detection of a battery fault can cause a loss of drive power, increasing the risk of a crash.

Number of Units Affected: 17.0
